name: A Machine With Xenochromatic Ball Octopus Abilities?

imgDesc.text: Sometimes you may see these strange ecological research devices on land. Perhaps because Transoceanic Sourcewater has identified the power of Fontemer Aberrants, after <color=#ffe14b>interacting</color> with them, you can use the power of the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus <color=#ffe14b>within a certain range</color> even when on land.
